src:
V španskem dvoboju Vinales pred Marquezom na VN Malezije

03 Nov 2019, 07:48


Sepang, 3. novembra - Španec Maverick Vinales (Yamha) je zmagal na veliki nagradi Malezije v motociklizmu v kraljevem razredu motoGP. Drugi je bil na dirkališču v Sepangu njegov rojak Marc Marquez (Honda), ki je že pred to dirko osvojil naslov svetovnega prvaka, tretji je bil Italijan Andrea Dovizioso (Ducati), drugi v skupnem seštevku po predzadnji dirki sezone SP.



Nemčija, Hohenstein-Enstthal. Španski dirkač Maverick Vinales (Movistar Yamaha).Foto: dpa/STA Arhiv dpa/STA
text:
In the Spanish duel of Vinales before Marquez at the GP of Malaysia

03 Nov 2019, 07:48


Sepang, Nov 3 - Spaniard Maverick Vinales (Yamha) wins the Malaysia Motorcycle Grand Prix in the royal motoGP class. Second in the Sepang race was his cousin Marc Marquez (Honda), who had won the World Championship before that race, third was Italian Andrea Dovizioso (Ducati), second overall after the penultimate race of the SP season.



Germany, Hohenstein-Enstthal. Spanish driver Maverick Vinales (Movistar Yamaha) .Foto: dpa / STA Archive dpa / STA
